message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you the chance to acquire [Product Name] for a price that I believe will be mutually beneficial. This product is incredibly valuable, and I'm confident it can bring significant value to your business. While the market value of this product is over $1 million, I'm willing to offer it to you for a special price. Please let me know if you're interested, and we can discuss the details further.
